-- | Deprecated in favor of eros.
--   
@package txtblk
@version 0.2.0.1


-- | This library exists to censor rude, sexual, or inflammatory text.
--   We've all accidentally texted our grandmother calling her a dirty
--   whore.
module Text.Censor

-- | The list of bad words
badWords :: [String]

-- | Check if one of the bad words is in the list, return the bad words.
getBadWords :: String -> [String]

-- | Check is one of the bad words is in the list, return a boolean.
check :: String -> Bool
